DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind randomize control trial evaluate serum level 25 ( OH ) D single oral dose cholecalciferol 50,000 IU plus ezetimibe placebo . Differences serum level 25 ( OH ) D response cholecalciferol plus ezetimibe compare cholecalciferol plus placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Inhibitor Cholesterol Absorption Vitamin D Levels
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : To evaluate serum level 25 ( OH ) D single oral dose cholecalciferol 50,000 IU plus ezetimibe placebo . Experimental design : Double-blind randomized control trial . Research location : Porto Alegre Clinical Hospital ( HCPA ) , RS , Brazil . Participants : Medical resident HCPA . Intervention : The group randomize ezetimibe 10 mg 5 day placebo . On fifth day , come overnight fast blood test collection [ 25 ( OH ) D , PTH , calcium , albumin ] . Next , participant receive orally cholecalciferol 50,000 IU capsule snack contain 15g fat . Participants return 14 day second blood test . Statistical Analysis : Paired sample t-test Wilcoxon sign rank-test used comparing variable two distinct moment ( cholecalciferol 14 day ) . The correlation numerical variable evaluate Spearman 's correlation coefficient . A p value le 0.05 consider statistically significant . Expected result : Differences serum level 25 ( OH ) D response cholecalciferol plus ezetimibe compare cholecalciferol plus placebo . Cost/benefit project : This low budget minimal risk study contribute good understand absorptive process vitamin D effect ezetimibe absorption .
DOC.criteria: Medical student HCPA Body mass index > + 25 < 18.5 kg/m2 Known liver , kidney endocrine disease Known malabsorption Use supplement calcium and/or vitamin Danticonvulsants , barbiturates , glucocorticoid Travel outside Brazilian south region previous 120 day
